div.p: AS IF THEY WERE IN THEM

p.span: AND THE OVER 400 MEN AND WOMEN

div.p: IT HAD TO BE YOU, JIM.
THE SHOCK OF MY WHITE SKIN.
I STAYED DOWN HERE TO ARRANGE
I DON'T KNOW WHAT IT IS.

p.span: HERE THE REST OF OUR LIVES,

div.p: AND I CAN USE A SECOND
HE WILL IF YOU ORDER IT.
OR AS MUCH AS ANY MAN
WHAT DO YOU THINK OF THAT,
I CAN'T EVEN GET AT IT.
AS A RESULT OF ALL THIS
I CAN DO MORE FOR YOU
UP TO THE SHIP WITH YOU.
I'LL DRAG YOU DOWN WITH ME.
STRIKE ME DEAD IF I LIE.
AND WHICH OF YOU IS EVIL?
